name: Pink Marble Soap Natural and Vegan Olive Oil Soap Great for Shaving
description:
Pink Marble Soap Natural and Vegan Olive Oil Soap Great for Shaving

Beautiful artisan soap perfect for ladies! Very pleasant for general face and body washing and excellent for shaving, too! French pink clay makes the razor glide smoothly on your skin, makes generous lather and adds some colour as well. We combined several essential oils that give the soap a lovely floral scent.

This listing is for 1 bar of soap - approx. weight 4.6 oz (130 g)

HOW TO CARE FOR YOUR SOAP:
Always keep the soap in a draining dish. Never leave it in water. Allowed to dry between uses, it lasts long. Rub your wet hands around the dry soap. Don’t use it under running water. Care for your soap, keep it dry and cool - you will enjoy it longer.

Try our other varieties of handmade artisan soap or the French/hand milled soap and check us out soon as more are to come.
Lavender Soap
Honey & Oat Soap – exfoliating
Cinnamon Marble Soap
Pink Marble Soap - great for ladies' shaving
Baby Bear Lavender Soap - great for children and babies
Patchouli & Orange Soap
Olive & Oatmeal Soap - unscented
Milk soap - with fresh milk
Poseidon - French/hand milled soap with seaweed
Coffee Addict - French/hand milled, exfoliating
I love Cucumbers - hand/French milled, with fresh cucumbers

~ ~ ~
ABOUT:
All Pure Naturalis soap is made completely from scratch with basic raw ingredients such as extra virgin olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sunflower oil, cocoa butter, shea butter, grapeseed oil, avocado oil, sweet almond oil, jojoba oil, castor and hemp oil. We will never use pre-made, mass-production melt and pour bases. All bars contain their original glycerin and are superfatted - it means that some oil is left unsaponified in the final soap to nourish your skin even more. Coloured with dried herbs, flowers, seeds and spices, scented with pure essential oils only our soap is excellent for all skin types, children and dry, sensitive skin. Try it once and you will see the difference immediately.

~ ~ ~
If you would like more of the same item, please let me know as I always have some in stock.

SHIPPING: I refund overcharges in excess of $1.
Your ordered items(s) will be beautifully wrapped and ready for gift-giving.

PAYMENT: You DO NOT need to have a PayPal account to purchase, just click the Paypal button when you go through the checkout and look for the link to pay with your credit card.

~ ~ ~

name: 100% Pure Beeswax Pillar CandleUnique Signature Pattern
description:
Pure Beeswax Pillar Candle Unique Signature Pattern All Natural

Handmade with 100% pure beeswax that I buy directly from beekeepers around London in south-western Ontario. The horizontal dripped pattern is unique and my signature pattern.
I use 100% cotton wicks that I hand crochet in order to achieve the right thickness for this particular candle size. The wicks are pre-dipped and there is no zinc or lead core in them. I do not use any essential oils for these pillars but they give off lovely sweet honey scent that is so natural to pure beeswax.

This listing is for 1 pillar candle that weights approx. 1 lb. (485 g).
Measurements: 3" wide x 4" tall (8 cm x 10 cm)
Burn time: over 100 hours

Pure beeswax candles create soft, beautiful and warm light that also purifies the air by creating negative ions. They are non-toxic and non-allergic, perfect for any occasion and they burn several times longer than paraffin candles. They burn without creating soot and smoke. If you burn them in a draft-free environment, they don't drip.

HOW TO USE:
To enjoy this candle as long as possible trim the wick to 1/4" (5-8 mm) and as it burns, push soft sides inward. Burn for 3-4 hours at a time. Frosted white coating called "bloom" will develop over time which is attractive and a sure sign that the candle is made of 100 % pure beeswax. If you don't like it, polish it with soft cotton cloth.

ABOUT:
All Pure Naturalis products are made completely from scratch with basic raw ingredients such as plant oils and butters, clays, salts, fresh and dried botanicals. Some of the products may include beeswax that I obtain from local farmers. There are no synthetic colours or preservatives. A few products include tiny amount of high quality grain alcohol. My formulations are coloured with dried herbs, flowers, seeds and spices and scented with pure essential oils only. Most of our products are excellent for all skin types, children and dry, sensitive skin. And of course they are always free of SLS, parabens, propylene glycol, triclosan, mineral oils, petrolatum, paraffin, artificial fragrances and GMO oils such as soy, cottonseed, canola and corn.

~ ~ ~
If you would like more of these beautiful candles, please let me know as I always have more in stock.

SHIPPING: I refund overcharges in excess of $1.
Your ordered items(s) will be beautifully wrapped and ready for gift-giving.

PAYMENT: You DO NOT need to have a PayPal account to purchase, just click the Paypal button when you go through the checkout and look for the link to pay with your credit card.

~ ~ ~

name: Lime+Mint Lip Balm All Natural Unsweetened by Pure Naturalis
description:
Lime+Mint Lip Balm - citrus and mint mix is fantastic. It's very fresh and cooling.

Pure Naturalis lip balms are lovely balms for chapped, dry lips. They smell delicious and leave your lips feel wonderful and soft.
Try them and you will never want to buy a petroleum one anymore!

This listing is for 1 Lip Balm tube - 0.15 oz (5 g)

All lip balms are formulated with hydrating and nourishing ingredients like organic extra-virgin olive oil and organic sunflower oil that I infused with home-grown calendula (pot marigold) and chamomile. Cocoa butter, pure beeswax and vitamin E protect the delicate lip skin and pure essential oils add lovely scent.
I have recently reformulated my recipe to make it free of any nut oils and butters. Even though I make sure the ingredients do not come in contact with any nut materials while I process them, I cannot guarantee how my suppliers handle them.

Try other varieties, too:
Lavender Lip Balm - with lavender essential oil. Because we love lavender for its smell and skin-healing properties, we also offer it in this untraditional lip balm.

Tea Tree Lip Balm -tea tree essential oil helps to prevent and soothe cold sores. It is well-known for its antiseptic, antibacterial and healing qualities.

Orange Lip Balm - with sweet orange essential oil this balm is a total favorite! Fruity, sweet, juicy aroma will cheer you up all year round.

Mint Lip Balm - this is the cool one for peppermint lovers! Refreshing and chilling.

Espresso Lip Balm - coffee lovers's favourite! Contains expensive Coffea arabica essential oil.

Unflavoured Lip Balm - great choice for all that prefer no scent at all.

~ ~ ~
ABOUT:
All Pure Naturalis products are made completely from scratch with basic raw ingredients such as plant oils and butters, clays, salts, fresh and dried botanicals. Some of the products may include beeswax that I obtain from local farmers. There are no synthetic colours or preservatives. A few products include tiny amount of high quality grain alcohol. My formulations are coloured with dried herbs, flowers, seeds and spices and scented with pure essential oils only. Most of our products are excellent for all skin types, children and dry, sensitive skin. And of course they are always free of SLS, parabens, propylene glycol, triclosan, mineral oils, petrolatum, paraffin, artificial fragrances and GMO oils such as soy, cottonseed, canola and corn. 

~ ~ ~
If you would like more tubes of the same lip balm, please let me know as I always have more in stock.

SHIPPING: I refund overcharges in excess of $1.
Your ordered items(s) will be beautifully wrapped and ready for gift-giving.

PAYMENT: You DO NOT need to have a PayPal account to purchase, just click the Paypal button when you go through the checkout and look for the link to pay with your credit card.

~ ~ ~

name: Honey & Oat Soap, Natural Vegan Soap by Pure Naturalis
description:
Lovely exfoliating bar for hands and body. Freshly ground organic oats added to
the soap will remove the old skin cells. Honey will moisturize it and palmarosa essential oil will scent it nicely. All hard working hands that need extra cleaning can benefit from this bar. Vegan - contains no animal products or by-products.

This listing is for 1 bar of soap - approx. weight 4.6 oz (130 g)

HOW TO CARE FOR YOUR SOAP:
Always keep the soap in a draining dish. Never leave it in water. Allowed to dry between uses, it lasts long. Rub your wet hands around the dry soap. Don’t use it under running water. Care for your soap, keep it dry and cool - you will enjoy it longer.

Try our other varieties of handmade artisan soap or the French/hand milled soap and check us out soon as more are to come:

Cinnamon Marble Soap
Pink Marble Soap

Milk soap - with fresh milk
Poseidon - French/hand milled soap with seaweed
Coffee Addict - French/hand milled, exfoliating
I love Cucumbers - hand/French milled, with fresh cucumbers

~ ~ ~
ABOUT:
All Pure Naturalis soap is made completely from scratch with basic raw ingredients such as extra virgin olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, sunflower oil, cocoa butter, shea butter, grapeseed oil, avocado oil, sweet almond oil, jojoba oil, castor and hemp oil. We will never use pre-made, mass-production melt and pour bases. All bars contain their original glycerin and are superfatted - it means that some oil is left unsaponified in the final soap to nourish your skin even more. Coloured with dried herbs, flowers, seeds and spices, scented with pure essential oils only our soap is excellent for all skin types, children and dry, sensitive skin. Try it once and you will see the difference immediately.
